page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE 1
page.content: On the morning Grandma gets up at seven a.m.and wakes me up too.For half an hour i read my reading book ,i then wash my face and get changed.I then brush my hair well because it gets tangled during the night.Afterwards i go downstairs where breakfast is ready.I eat my breakfast,and insist that i should wash the dishes.After i have finshed i put on my jacket and wait for Farhat to call for me.when she arrives we both walk to school together. Today it is Wednesday and we read our reading books for half an hour and then we do our sentences or story. When we have finished we do Passwords.At 10.30 we go out to play, and I play with my friends.
